name: 3DiCD
tag_list: music, digital, marketing, format, streaming, download, audio, artists, major-label, embed, player, audio-widget
overview:
A new social media friendly music format for digital marketing.

Each 3DiCD has fully viewable 3D rendered album packaging and audio streaming, with access to full booklet artwork and lyrics, plus share links and territory specific purchase points. It can be embedded on blogs, digital stores, Facebook tabs and anything inbetween.

Who uses 3DiCD?

Current clients include: EMI, Sony Music, Universal, Columbia, Nickelodeon, RCA, Harvest, MofoHifi, dTox

They say:

“The swishest looking streaming player we’ve seen yet” Music Ally

“Provides colour to the often sterile experience of purchasing MP3s online” Music Week

“A new dimension in downloads” Music Week

“Very Cool” Robert Scoble

milestones.description: 3DiCD moves into the 'majors' arena delivering projects for EMI Records UK and Sony Music US.
